 Returns the preferred address of the first byte of the image when it is loaded in memory. This value is a multiple of 64K bytes. The default value for DLLs is 0x10000000. The default value for applications is 0x00400000, except on Windows CE where it is 0x00010000. More...

Detailed Description

Exposes methods to access Portable Executable (PE) Optional header fields.

Member Function Documentation

HRESULT INktStructPEOptionalHeader::AddressOfEntryPoint ( [out, retval] LONG *  pVal)
get

Returns a pointer to the entry point function, relative to the image base address. For executable files, this is the starting address. For device drivers, this is the address of the initialization function. The entry point function is optional for DLLs. When no entry point is present, this member is zero.

Parameters
pValPointer to receive the value.
HRESULT INktStructPEOptionalHeader::BaseOfCode ( [out, retval] LONG *  pVal)
get

The size of the optional header, in bytes.

Parameters
pValReturns a pointer to the beginning of the code section, relative to the image base.
HRESULT INktStructPEOptionalHeader::CheckSum ( [out, retval] LONG *  pVal)
get

Returns the image file checksum. The following files are validated at load time: all drivers, any DLL loaded at boot time, and any DLL loaded into a critical system process.

Parameters
pValPointer to receive the value.
HRESULT INktStructPEOptionalHeader::DataDirectoryEnd ( [in] LONG  index,
[out, retval] my_ssize_t *  pVal 
)
get

Returns a pointer to the end of IMAGE_DATA_DIRECTORY structure.

Parameters
pValPointer to receive the value.
HRESULT INktStructPEOptionalHeader::DataDirectoryStart ( [in] LONG  index,
[out, retval] my_ssize_t *  pVal 
)
get

Returns a pointer to the start of IMAGE_DATA_DIRECTORY structure.

Parameters
pValPointer to receive the value.
HRESULT INktStructPEOptionalHeader::DllCharacteristics ( [out, retval] short *  pVal)
get

Returns the DLL characteristics of the image. See http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/ms680339(v=vs.85).aspx for available constants.

Parameters
pValPointer to receive the value.
HRESULT INktStructPEOptionalHeader::FileAlignment ( [out, retval] LONG *  pVal)
get

Returns the alignment of the raw data of sections in the image file, in bytes.

Parameters
pValPointer to receive the value.
HRESULT INktStructPEOptionalHeader::ImageBase ( [out, retval] my_ssize_t *  pVal)
get

Returns the preferred address of the first byte of the image when it is loaded in memory. This value is a multiple of 64K bytes. The default value for DLLs is 0x10000000. The default value for applications is 0x00400000, except on Windows CE where it is 0x00010000.

Parameters
pValPointer to receive the value.
HRESULT INktStructPEOptionalHeader::LoaderFlags ( [out, retval] LONG *  pVal)
get

Returns the loader flags. This field is obsolete.

Parameters
pValPointer to receive the value.
HRESULT INktStructPEOptionalHeader::Magic ( [out, retval] LONG *  pVal)
get

The state of the image file. See http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/ms680339(v=vs.85).aspx for details.

Parameters
pValPointer to receive the value.

HRESULT INktStructPEOptionalHeader::NumberOfRvaAndSizes ( [out, retval] LONG *  pVal)
get

Returns the number of directory entries in the remainder of the optional header. Each entry describes a location and size.

Parameters
pValPointer to receive the value.
HRESULT INktStructPEOptionalHeader::SectionAlignment ( [out, retval] LONG *  pVal)
get

Returns the alignment of sections loaded in memory, in bytes. The default value is the page size for the system.

Parameters
pValPointer to receive the value.
HRESULT INktStructPEOptionalHeader::SizeOfCode ( [out, retval] LONG *  pVal)
get

Returns the size of the code section, in bytes, or the sum of all such sections if there are multiple code sections.

Parameters
pValPointer to receive the value.
HRESULT INktStructPEOptionalHeader::SizeOfHeaders ( [out, retval] LONG *  pVal)
get

Returns the combined size of the following items, rounded to a multiple of the value specified in the FileAlignment member: e_lfanew member of IMAGE_DOS_HEADER, 4 byte signature, size of IMAGE_FILE_HEADER, size of optional header, size of all section headers.

Parameters
pValPointer to receive the value.
HRESULT INktStructPEOptionalHeader::SizeOfHeapCommit ( [out, retval] my_ssize_t *  pVal)
get

Returns the number of bytes to commit for the local heap.
